known_issues: Chapter details status selector (Completed/Incomplete/Tough) cannot be deselected/changed after selecting one; UI only advances forward with no option to revert.

existing_features.title: Update the Chapter Details status controls (Completed / Incomplete / Tough) so the user can deselect a previously selected status and revert the chapter status back to "Not Started".

Update the Chapter Details status controls so the user can switch between statuses freely (Completed / Incomplete / Tough) without the UI disabling the currently selected option in a way that prevents re-selection behavior (needed for toggle-to-clear).

projectName: Allow chapter status selection to be changed or cleared in Chapter Details
